title: Do Vaccines Cause Autism?
description:
Why is there still a vaccine/autism controversy?  Because families have been blocked from getting into a REAL court to prove that vaccines have caused their child's autism.  

The Canary Party presents a video on the corrupt Vaccine Injury Compensation Program to show how the federal government and pharmaceutical companies continue to get away with claiming that vaccines don't cause autism in the face of mounting evidence that they are doing just that in a growing number of children.

Join our mailing list: http://canaryparty.org/index.php/join-us

Find our more: http://canaryparty.org/index.php/the-news/129-the-canary-partys-new-viral-video-do-vaccines-cause-autism

Scientific evidence showing the vaccine/autism link: http://canaryparty.org/index.php/the-news/97-research-that-shows-that-vaccines-can-cause-autism

Produced by Old Port Media

S.C.V. Taylor - Voice Over  Producer
Briana Leon - Voice Over Production Assistant

Special Thanks to
Shawn Michael Howard

Voice Over recorded at:
Salt Light Sound, Hollywood

Video by:
The Draw Shop

Special Thank You to:
The Elizabeth Birt Center for Autism Law and Advocacy
The National Vaccine Information Center
tags: Autism (Disease Or Medical Condition)', 'Vaccine (Technology Class)', 'MMR Vaccine Controversy (Exhibition Subject)', 'Medicine (Field Of Study)', 'Disease (Organization Sector)', 'Rob Schneider (Comedian)', 'Vaccine Court'
